means: 基督降临节（圣诞节前的四个星期）

sentence.Network_en: Swallows come by groups at the advent of spring.
sentence.Network_cn: 春天来临时燕子成群飞来.

sentence.Network_en: The advent of the Euro will redefine Europe.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧元的出现将重新定义欧洲.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...的共同基础的核心问题是“未来”问题。如何思考未来？它同当前有什么关系？“未来”(futurum)同“出现”(advent)有什么区别？一个引人注目的事实是：马克思主义脱离上帝谈未来(future without God)，.
...adventn.到来，来临;词根记忆：ad+vent(到来)adventitiousa.偶然的;来自advent(到来)+itious→(突然)到来的→偶然的adversea.不利的，相反的；敌对;词根记忆：ad(坏)+verse(转)→不利的；敌对的.
adopt收养；采纳advent来临，来到5．be- 方位
adventitious ADVENTITIOUS [`9dven'ti62s]ADVENTITIOUS adj. 偶然的(英) adj. 偶然的(accidental; casual)(记) advent(来到)+itious →(突然)来到的→偶然的adventurous ADVENTUROUS [2d'vent62r2s]

list.abs: adventive crater 寄生火口adventive volcano 寄生火山aecidiospore 锈孢子
adventive 不定的adventive embryo 不定胚adventive root 不定根
adventive bud 不定芽adventive root 不定根adverse current 逆流
adventive 不定的adventive bud 不定芽adventive root 不定根

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English , from Latin adventus 'arrival', from advenire, from ad- 'to' + venire 'come'

entry.tran: （重大事件、发明或情况的）出现，问世，到来
entry.def: The advent of an important event, invention, or situation is the fact of it starting or coming into existence.

example.ex: ...the leap forward in communication made possible by the advent of the mobile phone.
example.tran: 手机的问世带来了通讯业的迅猛发展

example.ex: The advent of war led to a greater austerity.
example.tran: 战争的到来使形势更为严峻。

entry.def: The advent of a person at a place is their arrival there.

example.ex: Deptford had come alive with the advent of the new priest at St Paul's.
example.tran: 圣保罗教堂新牧师的到来使德特福德变得生机勃勃。

means.word_mean: 1. arrival that has been awaited (especially of something momentous);

auth_sentence.content: Since the advent of agriculture it's a different story.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since the advent of agriculture it's a different story.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since the advent of agriculture it's a different story.

auth_sentence.content: The advent of DSLRs has revived that debate.
auth_sentence.res_content: The advent of DSLRs has revived that debate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The advent of DSLRs has revived that debate.

auth_sentence.content: With the advent of 3G, DoCoMo plans to expand i-Mode.
auth_sentence.res_content: With the advent of 3G, DoCoMo plans to expand i-Mode.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With the advent of 3G, DoCoMo plans to expand i-Mode.

sentences.en: Since the advent of atomic power, there have been great changes in industry.
sentences.cn: 自从原子能问世以来，工业领域起了很大变化。

sentences.en: I awaited Christmas Eve, and the always exciting advent of fat Santa.
sentences.cn: 我等待着圣诞前夜，以及圣诞胖爷爷那总是令人兴奋的到来。

jushi.english: Before the advent of computers, not many people knew how to type.
jushi.chinese: 计算机出现之前,没有多少人会打字。

jushi.english: This sort of work would have been inconceivable before the advent of microprocessors.
jushi.chinese: 在微处理机问世之前这种工作是难以想象的。

jushi.english: Britain was transformed by the advent of the steam engine.
jushi.chinese: 英国的生活由于蒸汽机的出现而发生变革。
